content.description: list and HOF (2017 Spring, Midterm 1, Question 7 part a)

p.line: For each of the following questions, indicate which of _BOLDS_(M)ap_BOLDE_, _BOLDS_(K)eep_BOLDE_, and _BOLDS_(C)ombine_BOLDE_ would be used to solve it, and if more than one are used, in what order they are evaluated (count any helpers too). For example, given:

You could express it as _BOLDS_M_LARR_K_BOLDE_: the result of Keep is sent to Map. Note that you could use other converters such as _CODES_list_RARR_word_CODEE_ or _CODES_word_RARR_list_CODEE_(but so not use Map, Keep or Combine in your helper blocks).
If more than one solution works, please pick the simpler one.(e.g., K vs C_LARR_K or C_LARR_K_LARR_M).
How to reverse the letters of a word?

content.hint: Consider the input and output of M, K, C - what operations does each of them do to a list? Think of it abstractively.
